BoosterPacks:AdditionalMemory.NAME: Additional Memory
BoosterPacks:AdditionalMemory.FLAVOR: Actually made of two parts. The red one being the RAM, but you can't remember the name of the blue one.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if you have no empty orb slots, gain 1 #yFocus for this turn.

BoosterPacks:BlackLED.NAME: Black LED
BoosterPacks:BlackLED.FLAVOR: Breaks at least three laws of physics, as well as the Geneva convention.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yDark #yOrbs start at #b10 damage.

BoosterPacks:BookOfHorrors.NAME: Book of Horrors
BoosterPacks:BookOfHorrors.FLAVOR: Contain the recipe to pineapple pizza.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, choose #b1 out of #b3 #yCurses to add to your hand. Gain #b2 #yStrength and #b2 #yDexterity.

BoosterPacks:CamperBag.NAME: Camper Bag
BoosterPacks:CamperBag.FLAVOR: The legends says that if you ever lay down this bag, you will never be able to move it again.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you discard an unplayable card a turn, draw #b1 card.

BoosterPacks:CarBattery.NAME: Car Battery
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a Power card, gain #b3 #yVigor.

BoosterPacks:CrimsonBow.NAME: Crimson Bow
BoosterPacks:CrimsonBow.FLAVOR: The energy contained within is absolutely titanic. It could take you to paradise.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you take damage from a #yCurse, gain #b1 #yStrength.

BoosterPacks:CryingNails.NAME: Crying Nails
BoosterPacks:CryingNails.FLAVOR: When there is no other sound around, you can hear a voice saying "It's a lie! It's a lie! It's a lie!"
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose HP, gain #b2 #yVigor.

BoosterPacks:CrystalBall.NAME: Crystal Ball
BoosterPacks:CrystalBall.FLAVOR: Possess the power to divine the divine.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, #yScry #b5.

BoosterPacks:CursedDrum.NAME: Cursed Drum
BoosterPacks:CursedDrum.FLAVOR: It is said that that the time interval between two of its songs never exceeds 17 minutes.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a Curse card, gain #b3 #yStrength and lose #b1 #yDexterity.

BoosterPacks:EnchantedZipper.NAME: Enchanted Zipper
BoosterPacks:EnchantedZipper.FLAVOR: This magical zipper was one of the most precious treasure of a powerful mafia boss.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yRetain every power at the end of your turn.

BoosterPacks:FuneralUrn.NAME: Funeral Urn
BoosterPacks:FuneralUrn.FLAVOR: The riches inside can only get out if you offer sacrifices.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever #yPoison is #yFatal, gain #b6 #yGold.

BoosterPacks:IronHelmet.NAME: Iron Helmet
BoosterPacks:IronHelmet.FLAVOR: This helmet seems to be constructed in a very bizarre way, as it is simply made of five iron ingots glued together.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, deal #b6 damage to ALL enemies.

BoosterPacks:LightBulb.NAME: Light Bulb
BoosterPacks:LightBulb.FLAVOR: The light it create is comparable to that of the sun. Breaking it could result in an entire world shattering.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b3 #yBlock per energy left.

BoosterPacks:LittleIdol.NAME: Little Idol
BoosterPacks:LittleIdol.FLAVOR: Worth its weight in gold, despite not being made of gold.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b3 #yMantra.

BoosterPacks:MagicOrb.NAME: Magic Orb
BoosterPacks:MagicOrb.FLAVOR: Whenever you enter a corridor, you can hear it, the curse of the orb. A very distinctive "Woof" can be heard, followed by ominous footsteps.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you finish a combat without losing HP, heal #b4 HP.

BoosterPacks:MagicStamp.NAME: Magic Stamp
BoosterPacks:MagicStamp.FLAVOR: This peculiar stamp seems to be unable to leave any mark, at least any visible mark.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, apply #b8 #yMark to ALL enemies.

BoosterPacks:MetalHand.NAME: Metal Hand
BoosterPacks:MetalHand.FLAVOR: The rumors of the Spire says that this hand's master is crazy.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, draw #b2 cards.

BoosterPacks:OilLamp.NAME: Oil Lamp
BoosterPacks:OilLamp.FLAVOR: There is no oil left. But you can still feel the remnants of its warmth.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, adds #b6 #yDark #yFlames to your exhaust pile.

BoosterPacks:PaperStatiou.NAME: Paper Statiou
BoosterPacks:PaperStatiou.FLAVOR: A literal representation of a god of paper.
DESCRIPTIONS: While in Divinity, deal 400% instead of 300%.

BoosterPacks:PictureBook.NAME: Picture Book
BoosterPacks:PictureBook.FLAVOR: Every page is composed of three different drawings, predicting the future. It is apparently the fifth book in the collection
DESCRIPTIONS: All of your Curses gain Forgotten.

BoosterPacks:PieceOfMind.NAME: Piece Of Mind
BoosterPacks:PieceOfMind.FLAVOR: A material thought. Its very existence defies the laws of consciousness.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add an #yOffense and a #yDefense to your hand.

BoosterPacks:PlasticGloves.NAME: Plastic Gloves
BoosterPacks:PlasticGloves.FLAVOR: This nice pair of gloves allow you to relieve some of your hand fatigue.
DESCRIPTIONS: You can now have #b12 cards in your hand.

BoosterPacks:PoisonousLotion.NAME: Poisonous Lotion
BoosterPacks:PoisonousLotion.FLAVOR: Not actually poisonous. Made of gummy bears. Monsters hate them.
DESCRIPTIONS: Shivs inflict #b1 #yPoison on their target.

BoosterPacks:RedWater.NAME: Red Water
BoosterPacks:RedWater.FLAVOR: Obviously originated from the Red Sea.
DESCRIPTIONS: For every curse in your deck, heal #b1 HP whenever you enter a Rest Site.

BoosterPacks:SmokeSword.NAME: Smoke Sword
BoosterPacks:SmokeSword.FLAVOR: Can deliver powerful blows to the air particles around you.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yExhaust a card, gain #b1 #yStrength for this turn.

BoosterPacks:SwordShapedLocket.NAME: Sword-Shaped Locket
BoosterPacks:SwordShapedLocket.FLAVOR: Genocidal intent seems to emanate from it.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain #b3 #yVigor.

BoosterPacks:TelephonePole.NAME: Telephone Pole
BoosterPacks:TelephonePole.FLAVOR: This very powerful blunt weapon seems to react to your orbs.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, #yChannel #b1 #yLighting.
